name: Sunlight Garden
close_time: Open 10 AM to 3 PM,  6 PM to 11 PM
description: Sunlight Garden is not one of the most popular Chinese restaurants in Colombo, but we don't really understand why. They've got good food, huge portions and great value for money.
tip: They don't have a liquor license- but you can bring alcohol from outside as long as you produce a receipt...
review:
Sunlight Garden is not one of the most popular Chinese restaurants in Colombo, but we don't really understand why. They've got good food, huge portions and great value for money.
Sunlight Garden’s serves up a  tasty selection of mainland Chinese (as opposed to Sri Lanka Chinese) options and the setting is pleasant.
